headline: KLA Market Share Gains Offset Valuation Concerns As AI R&D Expands
summary: KLA (NasdaqGS:KLAC) is reporting strong and sustained market share gains in semiconductor inspection equipment. These gains are linked to its leading edge inspection technology and industry leading gross margins. The company is using its robust profitability and cash generation to fund shareholder returns and AI focused R&D in Chennai. KLA, a key supplier of process control and inspection tools to chipmakers, sits at the center of the semiconductor equipment sector. Its recent market share...

headline: ASML Climbs 11% in a Month: Time to Buy, Sell or Hold the Stock?
summary: ASML Holding jumps 11% in a month as AI-driven EUV demand, a EUR 38.8B backlog and rising 2026 estimates fuel bullish momentum despite valuation concerns.

headline: Applied Materials jumps as AI demand drives chipmaking tool orders
summary: Feb 13 (Reuters) - Applied Materials' (AMAT) shares jumped 11.7% in premarket trading on Friday as investors bet that surging AI demand and ‌a tightening memory market will continue to drive orders for the ‌company's chipmaking tools, after it forecast second-quarter revenue and profit above Wall Street estimates.

raw.headline: Applied Materials jumps as AI demand drives chipmaking tool orders
